meanings.sent1: The little dog outyelps all the others in the park.
meanings.sent2: The puppy outyelps its siblings when it wants attention.
meanings.sent3: The chatty parrot outyelps the barking dogs in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter outyelps the noise of the crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The excited children outyelp the chirping birds in the early morning.

meanings.definition: To make a louder or more intense yelp than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: During playtime, the energetic puppy outyelps the older dog.
meanings.sent2: The cat outyelps the dog when it's hungry and wants food.
meanings.sent3: The loudspeaker outyelps the noisy traffic on the street.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement outyelps the cheers of the crowd at the game.
meanings.sent5: The thunder outyelps the sound of rain on the roof during the storm.
